The official website includes the following story snippet. 300 years after the events of Ghost of Tsushima, a new warrior, Atsu, arises from the ashes of her homestead. Filled with fury and determination, Atsu will hunt down those responsible for the death of her family and exact her revenge. Every odd job and bounty will provide the coin she needs for her journey.
